DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study learn potential effect visible light skin . More specifically , study examine whether incandescent lamp ( light bulb ) LED light bulb cause skin become darker . Investigators determine minimum threshold dose require achieve immediate pigmentation darkening ( IPD ) , persistent pigmentation darkening ( PPD ) , delay tanning ( DT ) Fitzpatrick skin type IV - VI utilize two visible light source .
DOC.criteria: Be healthy volunteer Fitzpatrick skin type IVI ; Agree abide Investigator 's guideline regard photosensitize drug photoprotection ; Be able understand requirement study , risk involve , able sign inform consent form ; Agree follow undergo studyrelated procedure . Women lactate , pregnant , plan become pregnant ; Patients recent history vitiligo , melasma , disorder pigmentation exception postinflammatory hyperpigmentation ; Patients know history photosensitivity disorder ; Photosensitizing medication may continue throughout study discretion investigator ; Patients know history melanoma nonmelanoma skin cancer ; Concomitant use tan bed ; Sun exposure irradiate control area ; Patients serious systemic disease . Patients known history hypersensitivity adhesives include adhesive tape .
